base_description: Rectangular cabinet, medium-sized, gray, modern style.
part_description: Two upper drawers, two lower doors, handles on each, rectangular shape, evenly spaced, centered on the front panel.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide horizontally within the cabinet frame, supported by internal tracks. The lower doors swing open on hinges, allowing access to the cabinet's interior storage space. Handles on each part facilitate opening and closing operations. The internal structure supports organized storage.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a countertop. It interacts with users through the handles, allowing access to stored items. Its flat top surface can support additional objects, while its design complements modern interior decor.
